subject: Automobile Racing
Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
lead_paragraph: Busch will miss Sunday’s race after breaking his right leg and left foot in a crash at Daytona International Speedway, an accident that quickly led track officials to vow to install safety barriers.
snippet: Busch will miss Sunday’s race after breaking his right leg and left foot in a crash at Daytona International Speedway, an accident that quickly led track officials to vow to install safety barriers.
